description: A standard library of actions that provides 'chart types' using the Brunel Library feature

items.name: Bar / Histogram
items.description: A bar chart showing counts for a single field. Numeric data is binned to form a histogram
items.action: bar x($1) y(#count) tooltip(#all) sort(#count)

items.name: Bar of Values
items.description: A bar chart showing summed values by a field. Numeric data is binned to form a histogram
items.action: bar x($1) y($2) tooltip(#all) sum($2) sort(#count)

items.name: Pie Of Counts
items.description: A pie chart showing counts for a single field. Numeric data is binned to form a histogram
items.action: bar polar color($1) y(#count)  label($1, ' (', #count, '%)') tooltip(#all) percent(#count) sort(#count) stack legends(none)

items.name: Pie Of Values
items.description: A pie chart showing summed values by a field. Numeric data is binned to form a histogram
items.action: bar polar color($1) y($2) sum($2) label($1, ' (', #count, '%)') tooltip(#all) percent($2) sort($2) stack legends(none)

items.name: Dot Plot
items.description: A set of dots on the X axis showing counts
items.action: point x($1) size(#count) tooltip(#all) style('symbol:circle')

items.name: Word Cloud
items.description: Sized text items
items.action: cloud label($1) size(#count) color($1) sort(#count)

items.name: Map
items.description: A basic map
items.action: map key($1) color(#count:gray) label($1) tooltip($1) legends(none)

items.name: Map of Values
items.description: A map colored by sums of a numeric field
items.action: map key($1) color($2) label($1) tooltip($1) sum($2)

items.name: Map of Categories
items.description: A map colored by mode of a categorical field
items.action: map key($1) color($2) label($1) tooltip($1) mode($2)

items.name: Heat Map
items.description: A table of two fields, showing counts
items.action: x($1) y($2) color(#count) sort(#count) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Clustered Counts
items.description: A bar chart of counts, clustered by a second field
items.action: bar x($1,$2) y(#count) tooltip(#all) color($2)

items.name: Stacked Counts
items.description: A bar chart of counts, stacked by a second field
items.action: bar x($1) y(#count) stack tooltip(#all) color($2)

items.name: Scatterplot
items.description: Two fields plotted against each other
items.action: point x($1) y($2) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Line Chart
items.description: Two fields plotted against each other
items.action: line x($1) y($2) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Area Chart
items.description: Two fields plotted against each other
items.action: area x($1) y($2) tooltip(#all) sum($2)

items.name: Stacked Area
items.description: Two fields plotted against each other, stacked by a third
items.action: area x($1) y($2) color($3) stack tooltip(#all)

items.name: Bubble Plot
items.description: A scatter plot with sized bubbles
items.action: point x($1) y($2) size($3:200%) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Symbol Plot
items.description: A scatter plot split by symbol type and color
items.action: point x($1) y($2) symbol($3) color($3) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Treemap
items.description: A treemap of Counts
items.action: treemap x($2) color($2[-0]) size(#count) label($1) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Tree
items.description: A decision tree visualization
items.action: tree x($2) size(#count) label($1) tooltip(#all)

items.name: Packed Bubble
items.description: A packed bubble chart
items.action: bubble color($1) size($2) tooltip(#all) label($1) sort($2)

items.name: Parallel Axes
items.description: A chart with axes parallel
items.action: parallel y($3,$2,$1) opacity(#selection:0.4)
